results.title: Golden Transvaal
results.creator_credit: John Da Silva and South African Tourist Corporation
results.brief_description: Within the borders of the Transvaal is to be found a wide diversity of attractions, both natural and manmade. These include Johannesburg, historic Pretoria, the flat plains and mountain ranges and the warm sub-tropical Lowveld, and the Kruger National Park.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Da Silva and South African Tourist Corporation

results.title: Golden summers: the Heidelberg school
results.creator_credit: Peter Purvis, Peter Bramley and National Gallery of Victoria
results.brief_description: Golden Summers covers the most celebrated period in the history of Australian art, the years from 1885 until shortly after the turn of the century. The artists at the time were Tom Roberts, Arthur Streeton, Charles Conder and Fred McCubbin, popularly known as the Heidelberg School, and they believed that it was their task to paint Australian realities. Narrated by Patrick McCaughey.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter Purvis, Peter Bramley and National Gallery of Victoria

results.title: Golden sands
results.creator_credit: John Shaw, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: Describes beach mining for minerals - rutile, zircon, ilmenite and monazite - as an important Australian industry. Shows several methods of extracting these minerals and explains many of their uses.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Shaw, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit

results.title: Golden river
results.creator_credit: P.V. Pathy and Documentary Films of India
results.brief_description: Rising in the ranges of Coorg, the Kaveri River flows eastwards for nearly 500 miles before entering the Bay of Bengal, traversing ancient agricultural lands, rich in rice and coffee. Traces the course of the Kaveri River which has been considered sacred by the Hindus for centuries. The waters of the river have been utilised for the generation of electic power at Sivasamudram and harnessed in Mysore and Mettur for the two great dams which irrigate thousands of acres of land.

results.title: Golden queen
results.creator_credit: Zain Hussain and Malayan Film Unit
results.brief_description: The pineapple industry in Malaya; harvesting, canning and selling the crop; the organisation of the industry; clearing land for new plantations, planting and caring for the plants; life on the plantation village.

results.title: Golden oldies
results.creator_credit: Arthur Everard, Derek Wright and New Zealand National Film Unit
results.brief_description: There are 80-year-olds who still jog, play golf, paint the roof of their house, work their farms and generally enjoy the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A positive look at ‘old age’ in the golden time of life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Arthur Everard, Derek Wright and New Zealand National Film Unit

results.title: Golden jungle tales
results.brief_description: Includes 3 stories from the Golden Book series. “The Saggy baggy elephant”: a parrot questions the elephant as to who he is, this sparks a journey of discovery into the jungle; “The Tawny scrawny lion”; the jungle animals devise a plan for a jungle free of the noise of the lion chasing animals; “Rupert the rhinoceros”; Rupert needs help, everytime someone comes near him he charges them.

results.title: Golden greats of golf
results.brief_description: For over 450 years it has been a game of ultimate challenge and skill. Many have tried to master it, but only a few have truly conquered the sport. Some of the names include Sarazen, Jones, Hogan, Nelson, Demaret, Berg, Snead, Palmer, Nicklaus, Player, Casper and Trevino. With the power of their drives, accuracy of their irons and touch of their putters.. they have become legends. Who could ever forget the kind of year Byron Nelson had in 1945 when he won 13 of 19 tournaments. or how about Billy Caspers incredible comeback victory over Arnold Palmer at the 1966 U.S. Open.

results.title: Golden greats of basketball
results.brief_description: This video includes Bill Russell, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Wilt Chamberlain, Bob Bousy, Julius Erving, Jerry West, Oscar Robertson, Bob Pettit, Rick Barry, Walt Frazier and Elgibn Baylor.
